channel.title: Getting rid of wild in a certain section?
channel.description: Hey, I'm still edditing this allstar source, and i've added a thieving area at the ardougne markets, but unfortunately it's a wild area how could i remove it for this section? Please show me with code and what to look for, will be very gratefull:) many thanks.

item.title: Getting rid of wild in a certain section?
item.dc:creator: @wed330 wed330
item.description:
@wed330 wrote:

no its in allstar, i said that. But thanks for trying, can anyoneelse help please?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 06, 2009, 08:03:30 am[/size][hr]kihomura, could you post more info please?:s[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 06, 2009, 08:11:31 am[/size][hr]please do help guys?=[[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 06, 2009, 09:33:43 am[/size][hr]come on guys, i still need help=[ i really want to perfect my server

Read full topic

item.title: Getting rid of wild in a certain section?
item.dc:creator: @Darkning Darkning
item.description:
@Darkning wrote:

is it a deltascape based source? if it is then go to your player.java and search isinwild. find out the coords of the thieving area and remove the area that goes with those coords.

sorry i couldnt explain more.

Darkning

Read full topic
